title: How to Get Geometry Dash Keys: Demon Keys & Colored Keys

steps.title: Best way: Getting Mana Orbs from levels.
steps.content: Best way: Getting Mana Orbs from levels. The most efficient way to get Keys (or Demon Keys, as many Geometry Dash users call them) is to get Mana Orbs from levels. For every 500 Mana Orbs you get, you will get 1 Key. [1] X Research source Orbs collected from chests don't count toward getting a Demon Key. You must play a rated level to get Mana Orbs. Each difficulty rating will give the following amount of Mana Orbs: Easy: 50 Orbs Normal: 75 Orbs Hard: 125-175 Orbs Harder: 225-275 Orbs Insane: 350-435 Orbs Demon : 500 Orbs

steps.title: Easiest way: Open daily chests.
steps.content: Easiest way: Open daily chests. There are two types of daily chests in Geometry Dash: the small chest (which you can open once every 4 hours) or the large chest (which you can open once every 24 hours). Both chests have a chance to give you 0 to 1 Keys when opened. [2] X Research source

steps.title: The Blue Key.
steps.content: The Blue Key. The Blue Key is one of the Keys required to open the Basement. You get the Blue Key as a reward for completing the Chaos Gauntlet. [3] X Research source The Chaos Gauntlet is hidden until you click on the blue lock in the Basement.

steps.title: The Green Key.
steps.content: The Green Key. The Green Key is another Key required to open the Basement. This Key is obtained by opening the first large chest on the third page of the Treasure Room. To open this large chest, you must open 50 chests. [4] X Research source

steps.title: The Orange Key.
steps.content: The Orange Key. The Orange Key is the last Key needed to open the Basement. This Key is found in the Chamber of Time, which can be accessed by clicking on the "ground" in the middle of the "Coming Soon" screen, which is in the main level slider. [5] X Research source You must click the orange lock to be able to click the hidden door on the "Coming Soon" screen. To open the secret door to the Chamber of Time, you must buy the Master Emblem for 1,000 Mana Orbs from the Secret Shop. [6] X Research source The Secret Shop is unlocked by getting to the final screen of the Treasure Room and paying 500 Diamonds .

steps.title: The Purple Key.
steps.content: The Purple Key. After unlocking the three locks in the Basement with the Blue Key, Green Key, and Orange Key, you will get a chest that has the Purple Key. The Purple Key is used to unlock the Demon Gauntlet. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Unlocking the Treasure Room.
steps.content: Unlocking the Treasure Room. You must have five Demon Keys to unlock the Treasure Room, which can be accessed via a door in the bottom-right corner of the Creator Menu. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Unlocking chests in the Treasure Room.
steps.content: Unlocking chests in the Treasure Room. Chests in the Treasure Room cost a varying amount of Demon Keys. Silver Chests require 1 Demon Key to open Gold Chests require 5 to 10 Demon Keys to open Tier 2 Chests require 25 to 100 Demon Keys to open

steps.title: Unlocking the Basement.
steps.content: Unlocking the Basement. The Blue, Green, and Orange Keys are used to unlock the Basement, which is where you get the Purple Key. Read this section to learn more about getting these keys.

steps.title: Unlocking the Demon Gauntlet.
steps.content: Unlocking the Demon Gauntlet. The Purple Key, obtained from the Basement, is used to unlock the Demon Gauntlet.
